title: Speech to Text for Whatsapp
description:
Having difficulties listening to your friends' audio messages? Feel annoying about the voice messages?

With this app you can convert your voice messages to texts.

1. Select one or more voice messages in Whatsapp.
2. Forward it.
3. Select "Speech to Text or Share".

Done! your voice messages will show up as text! You can even share your voice messages as WAV file.

title: OctoPanel for OctoPrint
description:
Main features :

- Beautiful and modern user interface
- Multi printers profiles
- Temperature charts
- Webcam visualisation with fullscreen mode
- Custom GCode command
- Full dashboard (temperatures, progress, remaining time...).
- Full control of your 3D Printer including movement, pre-heat and extrude functionalities.
- Listing of the Gcode availables (from local and SDcard).
- Start a new print.
- Full settings on the app (temperatures, reverse axes, movements step).
- QRCode scanning for the API Key.

OctoPanel is able to manage multiple 3D Printers with heated bed and up to two extruders.

Please read more information about Octoprint on http://octoprint.org

title: Boxing Manager
description:
Boxing Manager, the second in our game series and successor to the highly-acclaimed and best-selling World Title Boxing Manager.

NEW for Boxing Manager
* Multiple world and regional titles - customisable world titles to guide your fighters towards
* A new Name! World Title Boxing Manager becomes Boxing Manager!
* Brand new game interface - working with our players we’ve made the game even more playable than it was before
* New Fighter Growth and Development feature - allowing managers ever great control over their fighter’s development and destiny
* Improved fight engine! Even more realistic fight model including more commentary, cuts and injuries and much more.
* New Fight Instructions mode! Go ringside and influence the outcome of fights with clear simple corner instructions.
* Improved Training and trainer modules
* Huge game speed and performance increases to allow more fighters, more game world features as well as faster experience
* Detailed help and manual
* Huge new online community of fellow players


Boxing Manager lets you develop an unknown group of fighters and gym and scale the heights of world championship Boxing, anytime and anywhere.

Across the traditional weight divisions from Heavyweight to Flyweight and with fighters from across the world of boxing, can you write your name into the history books as one of the top boxing minds of the age?

Building gyms, hiring trainers, signing the right fighters, finding the right opponent for them, setting the right training plan, to managing their corner and strategy on fight night, the next page of boxing history is yours to turn.

Working exclusively on iPhone on iOS, you can get the most detailed and authentic, yet quick-playing boxing management game ever created.  

GAME FEATURES

EIGHT WEIGHT DIVISIONS
The major historic weight divisions are now live in Boxing Manager from Heavyweight to Flyweight. 

PLAY IN A MASSIVE FIGHTER UNIVERSE
With over 3,000 unique boxers in every game world, managers have the pick of a vast range of fighters of different weights, nationalities and abilities.

FIGHT VIEW
Be in the corner for your stable fighter’s bouts. Can you use the time between rounds to make the difference between winning and losing and provide your guy with the right instructions.


FIGHTER GROWTH
As your fighters win they acquire experience to convert into attribute improvements. Now shape the direction of your fighter’s career in ever closer details.

TRAINING
Take even greater control of your fighter than in previous versions by configuring custom training plans as they attempt to climb the ratings. 

STABLE AND FIGHTER STRATEGIES
Control the size and shape of your stable and gym. Find the right opponents for each of your fighters. 

INTUITIVE USER INTERFACE
Designed uniquely for iPhone, we are constantly fine tuning the experience to make the most usable boxing manager game ever created.

IN GAME NEWS AND INTRAY
Stay abreast with both your stable and fighter news as well as the ups and downs in the Boxing Manager game world with the in-game news system. Whether there’s a big heavyweight title fight been made, or one of your fighters wants you to arrange their next fight our in-game, the news system keeps you up to date.

MATCHMAKER
Using the unique Matchmaker function, plot a course for your fighters from the bottom of the rankings all the way through to the world title.

CONTRACT NEGOTIATION
Build your reputation and approach any of the fighters in the game with custom contract negotiation and our in-game fighter contract trading system. Sign your fighters at the right price and watch your profits grow as you develop their ranking and box office appeal.

MONTHLY RANKINGS
See where your fighters stand and what it will take to climb through the three world rankings and five regional rankings.

title: ACF - Bíblia de Estudo Fiel
description:
***** OUÇA A BÍBILA ACF, Almeida Corrigida Fiel *****

- Antigo e Novo Testamento em Áudio, narrados pelo Pastor Castellan (compra dentro do app).

O nosso objectivo é trazer-lhe a melhor Bíblia em Português, a Almeida Corrigida Fiel (ACF) da Sociedade Bíblica Trinitariana do Brasil, texto atualizado de 2013. 

A tradução ACF da Bíblia é 100% baseada no Textus Receptus do Novo Testamento (o mesmo usada pela Igreja ao longo dos séculos e pelos reformadores) e no Texto Massorético para o Antigo Testamento (o mesmo utilizado pelo povo judeu até hoje ).

Este applicativo foi cuidadosamente feito por cristãos e para os cristãos dispostos a ter uma relação mais estreita com o nosso Senhor Jesus Cristo, estudando Suas palavras.

Você vai ter excelentes momentos de comunhão com Deus ao estudar a Bíblia com este aplicativo que é simples de usar, incluindo estas principais características:

- Sem anúncios!

- Muitas fontes de texto disponíveis para facilitar a leitura.

- Faça suas próprias anotações, usando o nosso editor de texto.

- Modo de leitura diurno e modo de leitura noturno.

- Fácil alteração do espaçamento e tamanho do texto.

- Rápida para ampliação e redução o texto com gesto “pinch”.

- Alterar o brilho da tela de modo rápido.

- Justificar o texto para a esquerda, direita ou centro.

- Acesso rápido às referências cruzadas dos versos.

- Marque qualquer versículo facilmente.

- Compartilhe versículos bíblicos no Facebook.

- Busca rápida de palavras e frases na Bíblia.

- Velocidade ajustável de rolagem automática.

- Automaticamente sincronize suas notas, realces e marcadores com o iCloud.

- Mude o texto para qualquer cor (no menu de Fontes)

- Mude o fundo para qualquer cor (no menu de Fontes)

- Altere o tema App para qualquer cor (no menu de Fontes)

* Compra dentro do app:
- 1200 mapas de GPS em tempo real de locais bíblicos.

O poder das Escrituras é necessário para o seu crescimento espiritual, e é por isso que nós projetamos com cuidado o melhor aplicativo para o iPhone, iPod e iPad para que você possa examinar as escrituras diariamente (Atos 17:11). 

Obrigado por baixar a Bíblia Português ACF!

Para obter mais informações, visite www.biblias.com.br

title: WeightLifting Motion Camera
description:
This app is for making bar path tracking of weightlifting in real time.

'Equipment'
1. You can use this App with projector and screen.
2. In order to keep tracking of barbell with practical FPS (more than 20FPS), the 6th generation or later devices are required. (This App is developed with iPhone 7 Plus.)

If you want to ask any questions before purchasing, please visit support page.

'Preparation before starting App'
1. Set up barbell, weight plates and other equipments.
  (See screenshot for sample set up)
2. Connect your device to a projector.(If needed)

'Operation on device'
1. Start App. 
2. Select [Bar path tracker ] and press [Go].
3. The camera of device will be started.
4. Set cursor to the 45cm weight plate and press [Start] button. You can resize the cursor by the slider above.
5. Barbell tracking will be started. The path and vertical velocity of barbell center are shown.
6. You can record the video by iPhone's screen record function (iOS11 later).
7. You can change some settings in [Option] view.

*Note*
The price of app will be changed without any notifications.
The App contains Ads. (But no in-app purchases)
Last validated OS is iOS 13.1.3

'Disclaimers'
A third party can not use the result without permission of who in pictures or movies recorded by this app.
We assume no responsibility or liability for any actions taken as a result of using this Application, or for errors or omissions in content.

title: Kart Kraft -Street Racing Tour
description:
Race on the asphalt in Pro Racing Karts. Career Mode with Real Time Championships. Download Now. No in-app purchase, no ads. Pay once and have the full game.

Similar karts, similar engines. Always close, fast, competitive, fun, full game.

This is Kart Kraft.

BRING IT ON...
If you need something new, original and ultra competitive, a real racing game, Kart kraft is it.

⁃ The no.1 car racing game that will entertain you for more hours than you think!
⁃ Expect it to be challenging, fun, rewarding, the driving game you wanted.
⁃ No Assists. No Excuses. Real racing with real tracks.
⁃ Tested for authenticity by hundreds of pro go kart / car racing drivers including world champions.

----- YOUR GOAL -----

Karting: racing to F1. Build your career in Karts

⁃ Race Real People, Real Tracks, Similar Kit. Real Racing.
⁃ Beat EVERYONE to become world go karting champion
⁃ Single & multiplayer competition
⁃ Push Notify players to race head to head!

 So you’ll know when a rival speeds past you in a league or is beating your time on the asphalt.

----- KEY FEATURES -----
We’re the no.1 go kart game. Here’s why:
- On the grid: Real racing against real people.
- Close: Race in closely matched go karts from real brands - none of this massive upgrade, automatic win!
- Compete against pro kart/ car racing drivers! Yes, they play Street Kart!
- Real World tracks. Our grid: PFI, Adria, Wackersdorf, Mariembourg, Las Vegas Todd Road, and many more. 

Kart Kraft Racing works on all iPhone devices above the 6, iPad Mini 2, iPad Air or above.
